org.openintents.tools.simulator.model.sensor.sensors

类 RotationVectorModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openintents.tools.simulator.model.sensor.sensors.SensorModel
      • org.openintents.tools.simulator.model.sensor.sensors.RotationVectorModel

  • public class RotationVectorModel
extends SensorModel
    RotationVectorModel keeps the internal data model behind RotationVector Sensor.
    作者:
    ilarele
